snippet.title: Gadget Watch: Whistle, a fitness tracker for dogs
snippet.description: Bad news for lazy dogs: A new device, called Whistle, lets pet owners track how much exercise — or sleep — their four-legged friends are getting.

snippet.title: Prince George's County calendar, April 24-30, 2014
snippet.description: Community events include dance performances, egg hunts, youth summit, and peace conference.

snippet.title: Big riders mean big horses on Western trails
snippet.description: Wranglers in the West who have for decades cashed in on the allure of getting on a horse and setting out on an open trail say they have had to add bigger horses to their stables to help carry larger tourists over the rugged terrain.

snippet.title: D.C. community calendar, April 24-May. 1, 2014
snippet.description: Ears ringing?, Emancipation and Home Rule, Shakespeare birthday, Gilbert and Sullivan auditions.

snippet.title: Montgomery County Animal Watch
snippet.description: Dogs runs out of house and attacks canine; "Paws in the Park" festival is open for registration.

snippet.title: Fairfax County volunteer opportunities
snippet.description: Therapeutic riding programs, science literacy activities, animal welfare, food pantry help and more.

snippet.title: Don't laugh, but bronies may be propping up one of America's favorite companies
snippet.description: My Little Pony sales are off the charts -- and an unusual Internet subculture might be responsible.

snippet.title: A year to replant the rosemary
snippet.description: Most Washington winters don't faze this aromatic herb, but this wasn't most Washington winters.

snippet.title: Feed a crowd with a bourbon-glazed salmon fillet
snippet.description: With grilling season upon us, we'll all be looking for new and delicious ways to feed a crowd. So I want to share one of my favorites — a center-cut salmon fillet.

snippet.title: Patrick Stewart is Smithsonian magazine's first celebrity cover
snippet.description: The 'Star Trek' actor is the first to grace the front of the venerable magazine in its 44-year history.
